parameters.name: Visibility
parameters.description: True to show the selected component, false to hide it

parameters.name: Config_opt
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: Config_count
parameters.description: Number of configurations for the component

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: Array of the names of the configurations for the component

title: IAssemblyDoc.ISetComponentVisibility
description: Hides or shows the selected component in the specified configurations in this assembly document.
signature:
void ISetComponentVisibility( 
   System.Boolean
Visibility
,
   System.Int32
Config_opt
,
   System.Int32
Config_count
,
   ref System.String
Config_names
)
